subject: SACS
title: Urinary System Disease
info: expands on disorders of small animal urinary system. introduction to core and additional disorders.

subject: SACS
title: Directed Studies
info: students conduct a special project addressing a specific issue in veterinary medicine under the guidance of a faculty member.

subject: SACS
title: Sm. An. Cardiol.
info: students actively participate in the clinical evaluation and management of cardiopulmonary disease.  students perform physical examinations, electrocardiograms, and echocardiograms in addition to interpreting radiographs and participating in group case discussions.

subject: SACS
title: Sm. An. Clin. Oncol
info: students will have an integral, hands-on role in the clinical oncology service of the vth, admitting new cases, and participating in diagnostic and staging work-ups.  students will have the opportunity to perform routine diagnostic procedures, such as, ultrasound-guided aspirations and core biopsies, bone marrow biopsies, and lymph node biopsies.  in addition, students will participate in the monitoring and treatment of ongoing chemotherapy and radiation therapy patients.  students will be expected to prepare short presentations on selected topics relating to important issues in clinical and comparative oncology.  faculty will lead discussions relating to cancer biology, immunology, epidemiology, pathology, and principles of chemotherapy and radiation therapy.  rounds will be held daily, monday thru friday.  students will have evening, weekend and/or holiday case responsibility, as needed.

subject: SACS
title: Indep Study Vet Med
info: independent study, by arrangement, in a clinical area of veterinary medicine.

subject: SACS
title: Analysis of Urinalysis
info: improving one's ability to properly interpret various abnormalities detected by routine urinalysis will be the focal point of this course.  key concepts will be illustrated with clinical case material.

subject: SACS
title: Sm Anim Ortho Rad
info: roetgen signs of common bone diseases of small animals.

subject: SACS
title: Lag Anim Ortho Rad
info: roentgen signs of common bone diseases of large animals.  emphasizes the horse.

subject: SACS
title: Comp An Onc
info: the principles of veterinary oncology will be reviewed and the biologic behaviors, treatments, and prognosis of various neoplastic disorders will be discussed.

subject: SACS
title: Clin Vet Derm Path
info: microscopic pathology of basic dermatologic reactions and of variable disease states.

subject: SACS
title: Vet Derm Residency
info: rotations in veterinary dermatology clinics, and review of dermatopathology slides.  rotations through veterinary internal medicine and human dermatology service (medical school) and dermatology journal club.

subject: SACS
title: Sm. An. Roentgenol.
info: roentgeneology signs of common bone diseases of small animals.
